cocktail.402.name: New York Sour
cocktail.402.description: **Whiskey** sour finished with a float of **red wine**.
cocktail.402.instructions:
1. Add 60 ml of **bourbon**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 20 ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Float 15 ml of **red wine** on top.
7. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish as well.

cocktail.404.name: Nutty Irishman

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Frangelico**, 30 ml of **Baileys**, and 30 ml of **cream** to the shaker.

4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Optionally, top with a layer of loose **whipped cream**.
6. Garnish with a sprinkle of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktail.422.description: A bright agave spirit sour balancing **papaya**, **agave syrup**, **tequila añejo** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with **papaya**.
cocktail.422.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **tequila añejo**, 15 ml of **Aperol**, a slice of **papaya**, 22.5 ml of **agave syrup**, 22.5 ml of **lime juice**, and 15 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a **papaya** wedge.

2. Add 30 ml of **bourbon**, 30 ml of **Aperol**, 30 ml of **Amaro Nonino**, and 30 ml of **lemon juice**.

cocktail.424.instructions:

2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 20 ml of **apricot brandy**, and 15 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.

cocktail.425.name: Passion Fruit Fizz
cocktail.425.description: A tropical non-alcoholic fizz with tangy **passion fruit juice**, fresh **lime juice**, and sparkling **soda water**.
cocktail.425.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **passion fruit juice**, 20 ml of **lime juice**, and 15 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 90 ml of **soda water**.
6. Garnish with **passion fruit** and **mint**.

cocktail.426.name: Pastis Whisky Sour
cocktail.426.description: Pastis adds a pleasing hint of anise and liquorice to a classic **Scotch whisky sour**.
cocktail.426.instructions:
1. Add 50 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 10 ml of **Ricard**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, 12.5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, an **egg white**, and 3 dashes of **Angostura bitters** to a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a skewered **lemon** wheel and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.427.name: Pedro Manhattan
cocktail.427.description: Pedro Manhattan is a variation on the classic Manhattan cocktail that replaces the traditional sweet vermouth with **Pedro Ximenez sherry**. the Pedro Manhattan is a great choice for those who enjoy the classic Manhattan cocktail but want to try something a little different, with a unique flavour profile.
cocktail.427.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **bourbon**, 20 ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, a dash of **Angostura bitters**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.428.name: Penicillin
cocktail.428.instructions:
1. Muddle 3 pieces of fresh **ginger** in a shaker tin.
2. Add 60 ml of blended **Scotch whisky**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, and 25 ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Float 7.5 ml of **Lagavulin 16 years** on top.
7. Garnish with a **ginger candy**.

cocktail.429.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 10 ml of **dry vermouth**, and 10 ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish as well.

cocktail.431.name: Pimm's Cup
cocktail.431.description: A refreshing British highball built with **Pimm's No. 1**, citrus, cucumber, and sparkling mixers for a light, summer-ready serve.
cocktail.431.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Pimm's No. 1**.
3. Add a slice of **orange**, a slice of **lemon**, a slice of **cucumber**, and 2 **strawberry** slices.
4. Add more **ice**, then top with 60 ml of **lemonade** and 75 ml of **ginger ale**.
5. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.

cocktail.437.description: The ultimate tropical indulgence. a creamy, sweet blend of **white rum**, **coconut cream**, and **pineapple juice** that transports you straight to a caribbean beach.
cocktail.437.instructions:
1. Add 60 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **coconut syrup**, and 90 ml of **pineapple juice** into a blender.
2. Add 5 ml of **lime juice**(optional).
3. Add crushed **ice** and blend on high speed until smooth and slushy.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and a **maraschino cherry**.

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **vodka vanilla**, 20 ml of **passion fruit liqueur**, 15 ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 10 ml of **vanilla syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Serve with 60 ml of **champagne** on the side.

cocktail.441.description: A velvety and decadent dessert cocktail that combines the richness of **port** wine and **cognac** with a creamy texture from a fresh **egg yolk**.
cocktail.441.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **cognac**, 45 ml of **tawny port**, and an **egg yolk** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or small goblet.
6. Dust the surface with a pinch of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktail.442.instructions:
1. Fill a glass with about **ice**.
2. Pour in 45 ml of **White Port** and 90 ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and **mint** sprig.

cocktail.447.description: Inspired by the famous confectionery, this cocktail is a decadent dessert in a glass. It combines the creaminess of **Irish cream** with tropical coconut and sweet **vanilla** for a silky, indulgent treat.
cocktail.447.instructions:
1. Rim a snifter glass with **coconut flakes** by lightly wetting the edge and dipping it into the flakes.

3. Add **Irish cream**, **coconut liqueur**, and **vanilla syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture into the prepared snifter glass.
6. Sprinkle any remaining **coconut flakes** on top for an extra touch of texture.

cocktail.449.instructions:

cocktail.450.description: A strong **whiskey**-based cocktail from the 1930s, first documented in **The Savoy Cocktail Book**. the original note says it is "so called because it will either cure rattlesnake bite, or kill rattlesnake, and, moreover, make you see double.".
cocktail.450.instructions:
1. Pour 60 ml of **rye whiskey**, a dash of **absinthe**, 2 teaspoons of **lemon juice**, 2 teaspoons of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.451.name: Red Hook
cocktail.451.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward riff on the **Manhattan**. This **Brooklyn**-inspired cocktail balances the spicy kick of **rye whiskey** with the bittersweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and a touch of nutty maraschino.
cocktail.451.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **rye whiskey**, 15 ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 10 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with 2 maraschino cherries.

cocktail.452.description: A bold and minimalist two-ingredient drink. the neutral profile of **vodka** allows the deep, sweet, and tart notes of **cherry brandy** to take center stage for a smooth, dessert-like finish.
cocktail.452.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **vodka** and 30 ml of **cherry brandy**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktail.453.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Jägermeister**, 45 ml of **peach schnapps**, and 45 ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.
5. Garnish every shot with a strawberry.

While there are several variations, the most widely recognised classic version is a refined **brandy**-based drink designed as an aperitif or after-dinner digestif.

cocktail.482.instructions:
1. Rinse a chilled rocks glass with **absinthe**, swirling to coat the sides, and discard the excess.
2. In a separate mixing glass, muddle a **sugar** cube with **Peychaud's bitters** until dissolved.
3. Add 20 ml of **cognac** (or **rye whiskey**) and fill the mixing glass with **ice**.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into the prepared **absinthe**-rinsed glass without **ice**.
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

For 3 shots:

1. Pour 30 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 30 ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 20 ml of **maple syrup**, a dash of **Angostura bitters**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.

5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

This version is enhanced with a dash of aromatic **bitters** and a fresh **mint** garnish for a complex, spirit-forward experience.

cocktail.517.name: Strawberry Colada
cocktail.517.description: A vibrant and fruity twist on the traditional **Piña Colada**. This tropical delight blends **white rum** and creamy coconut with the sweet, tart flavour of fresh strawberries, creating a lush pink cocktail perfect for summer sipping.
cocktail.517.instructions:
1. Fill a blender with 150 g of **ice** cubes or crushed **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **white rum** and 20 ml of **strawberry liqueur**.
3. Add 50 g of fresh strawberries (or **strawberry** puree), 30 ml of **coconut cream**, and 90 ml of **pineapple juice**.
4. Blend on high speed until the mixture reaches a smooth, slushy consistency.
5. Pour the contents into a hurricane or chilled goblet glass.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.
7. Optionally, top with a dollop of **whipped cream** for extra decadence.

cocktail.518.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktail.518.description: A bright rum sour that perfectly balances fruity **strawberry liqueur** with the crispness of **white rum** and fresh **lime**. a pinch of **salt** and **black pepper** enhances the berry profile for a complex finish.
cocktail.518.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **strawberry liqueur**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**, 0.5 pinches of **black pepper**, and 0.5 pinches of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **strawberry** and a slice of **lime**.

cocktail.519.instructions:
1. Combine 40 g of fresh strawberries, 60 ml of **tequila blanco**, 40 ml of **Cointreau**, and 30 ml of **lime juice** in a blender.
2. Add 150 g of **ice**.

4. Pour the blended cocktail into the prepared glass.
5. Finish with a **strawberry** garnish.

cocktail.526.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Into a shaker with **ice** pour 45 ml of **coconut rum** and 45 ml of **pineapple juice**.

cocktail.539.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward **brandy** cocktail that balances the herbal notes of **rosemary** with the deep complexity of **cognac** and **Scotch whisky**. Subtle hints of **cherry** and **cinnamon** provide a warm, aromatic finish, making it an ideal choice for slow sipping.
cocktail.539.instructions:
1. Gently muddle the fresh **rosemary** sprig in the bottom of a mixing glass to release its aromatic oils.
2. Add the **cognac**, **Scotch whisky**, **Cherry Heering**, **Punt e Mes**, and **cinnamon syrup** to the mixing glass.
3. Fill the glass with **ice**.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and discard the peel or use it as garnish.
7. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and a **cinnamon** stick for a fragrant presentation.

cocktail.544.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.

1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **coconut liqueur**, 150 ml of **cranberry juice**, and 22.5 ml of **lime juice**.

4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

2. Add 30 ml of **rye whiskey**, 30 ml of **peach schnapps**, 15 ml of **triple sec**, 7.5 ml of **lemon juice**, 7.5 ml of **lime juice**, and 7.5 ml of **simple syrup**.

1. Add 6 **mint** leaves and 15 ml of **lime juice** to a glass and gently muddle.

1. Gently press **sage** leaves in a shaker.
2. Add 90 ml of **watermelon juice**, 20 ml of **lime juice**, 10 ml of **simple syrup**, and **ice**.

cocktail.586.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktail.586.description: Classic **bourbon** sour optionally enriched with **egg white**.
cocktail.586.instructions:
1. Pour 60 ml of **bourbon**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice, a **maraschino cherry**, and 3 drops of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktail.602.name: Zombie
cocktail.602.description: A legendary and potent Tiki classic that blends multiple rums, fresh **lime**, and tropical spice for a complex, sun-soaked experience.
cocktail.602.instructions:
1. Add **Jamaican dark rum**, 45 ml **gold Puerto Rican rum**, **demerara rum**, fresh **lime juice**, **falernum**, **don's mix**, **grenadine**, **Angostura bitters**, and **Pernod** into a blender.
2. Add 180 g of crushed **ice**.
3. Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.
4. Pour the contents into a tall glass or Tiki glass and add additional crushed **ice** to fill if necessary.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.
